long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Vox allows us to hold webpages accountable, by crowd-sourcing the process of fact checking. Alice may notice that a news article is misleading, post a clarifying note, and Bob will then see Alice's note when he stumbles upon the same article. Think of it as Twitter/X's Community Notes for the entire Web!
